SEARCH
Package uk.msci.project.rsa

Class SignatureCreationContext

java.lang.Object
uk.msci.project.rsa.BenchmarkingContext
uk.msci.project.rsa.SignatureBaseContext
uk.msci.project.rsa.SignatureCreationContext
public class SignatureCreationContext extends SignatureBaseContext
This class is a specialised context for the benchmarking of signature creation operations. It extends BenchmarkingContext to provide functionality specific to signature creation, such as exporting signatures on the generalised results view.

      Returns:

    • getSignatureResultsLabel

      public String getSignatureResultsLabel(boolean isComparisonMode)
      Overrides the method from the base class to provide a specific label for the signature creation operation results. Utilises the base method to construct the label based on the comparison mode status and sets the operation text to "Creation".
      Specified by:
      getSignatureResultsLabel in class SignatureBaseContext
      Parameters:
      isComparisonMode - Indicates whether the operations were conducted in comparison mode.
      Returns:
      A descriptive label for the signature creation operation results.
